scenario: The Motley Fool's board of directors includes Randi Zuckerberg, a former director of market development and spokeswoman for Facebook, and sister to Meta Platforms CEO Mark Zuckerberg. The company also has positions in and recommends Meta Platforms, as well as other companies including Alphabet, Visa, and Walt Disney. Parkev Tatevosian, a CFA with positions in Alphabet, Visa, and Walt Disney, is an affiliate of The Motley Fool and may be compensated for promoting its services. The Motley Fool has a disclosure policy and recommends a range of companies including Meta Platforms, Alphabet, and Visa.
